headline: Masco Corporation Announces Date for Earnings Release and Conference Call for 2025 First Quarter
summary: LIVONIA, Mich., March 24, 2025--Masco Corporation (NYSE: MAS) announced today that it will hold a conference call regarding 2025 first quarter results on Wednesday, April 23, 2025, at 8:00 a.m. ET. The conference call will be hosted by Masco President and Chief Executive Officer Keith Allman. Participants in the call are asked to register five to ten minutes prior to the scheduled start time by dialing 800-549-8228 or 289-819-1520. Please use the conference identification number 30320.
